title: Chhatrasal
overview: Revisiting the period when Mughals governed India and Aurangzeb's terror was known far and wide, Chhatrasal is the story of the warrior King who stood up against him. The story is set in 1649, in the region of Bundelkhand where King Chhatrasal decided to end the reign of terror of Aurangzeb. The mighty Mughals had crushed down many umpires and all bowed down to him to be saved from his wrath. But Chhatrasal was different and he was ready to die for his country with the hope that he would free it from Aurangzeb's evil dreams.
